title: 23 - The Underground Church in the Middle East / An Interview with Jennie Allen, “Pastor X” and David Platt
description:
Throughout history, persecution has always grown the church. the fastest-growing churches in the world are happening in the 10 most dangerous countries to be a Christian. Number one on the list? Iran. God is moving powerfully inside of Iran. There are an estimated 1 million believers in Iran alone. Join us today for this once-in-a-lifetime interview with the man who started it all. This episode just might change your life.

Watch the full extended version of the FREE webinar now, the replay will be available until June 20, 2021: https://www.rightnowmedia.org/webinar/jennie-interview

Learn more about GCM: https://www.catalyticministries.com/

Watch the documentary that started it all: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9SAPOLKF59U&vl=en
